item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurants and events in Providence.

This week's location is: Aqua at the Providence Marriott!

For those of you who usually have work conflicts on Monday nights, take advantage of this opportunity to get to know the great folks of the Providence Collective in a beautiful setting.

This tranquil outdoor space is primarily used for receptions, functions, etc. It's got a pool, bonfire pits, and an outdoor bar. We had plans to have happy hour here last week, but our plans were thwarted by Mr. Potato Head and his friends at Hasbro who were having a convention. This week, we'll have a space reserved outside at this oasis in the city to relax and enjoy the last night of summer! ....Sounds like fun! So let's check it out!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: Check with the hostess, but we're hard to miss!
item.name: Monday Night Happy Hour at Aqua
